title: Bare Confessions
description: Second in the Bare Love seriesWhile dealing with having to kill a man and losing her teaching position, Katie finds solace at Knowledge Is Power by leading women's group therapy. Secrets and lies are all around her and the one Detective Ben Marcum is keeping may just be the biggest of all. Ben is hiding more than anyone knows, even his best friend and partner Detective Gil Daniels. Will he trust Katie with the truth and his heart? Will their bare confessions stir the fire or blow it out?
author: Lacey Thorn
